name: Special Warfare
description: Special Warfare is a modern warfare multiplayer online FPS indie game developed by Battle Fire Studio, beautiful picture effect, 6 camps (Delta Force, Mercenary, SEAL, Army, SWAT, Terrorists）, zombie mode, you can use the weapon in your hand to kill the zombie army infected by biochemical virus.
minimum_requirements: OS: Windows® 7 32/64-bit / Vista 32/64 / XP Processor: Intel i3 2nd-Generation 2.5GHz Memory: 4 GB RAM Graphics: NVIDIA GeForce GTX650 or equivalent with 2GB VRAM DirectX: Version 9.0c Network: Broadband Internet connection Storage: 3 GB available space Sound Card: DirectX Compatible Sound Card with latest drivers
recommended_requirements: OS: Windows® 7 32/64-bit / Vista 32/64 / XP Processor: Intel i5 4th-Generation 3.5GHz or better Memory: 8 GB RAM Graphics: NVIDIA GeForce GTX760 or equivalent with 2GB VRAM DirectX: Version 9.0c Network: Broadband Internet connection Storage: 3 GB available space Sound Card: DirectX Compatible Sound Card with latest drivers
